title: Calories in Calzone Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in calzone pizza, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, and tips for variations to fit your diet.
assumptions: Standard baked calzone with cheese, pepperoni, vegetables, and tomato sauce; approximately 350g serving size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, fillings, crust thickness, brand, and baking method. Check labels or recipes when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical calzone pizza contains about 620 calories with balanced macros.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a calzone pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 620 calories for a standard serving.

faqs.q: What are the macros in calzone pizza?
faqs.a: About 72g carbs, 28g protein, 26g fat per calzone.

faqs.q: Is calzone pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically around 1350mg due to cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in calzone pizza?
faqs.a: Opt for veggie fillings, thin crust, or less cheese to cut 80-100 kcal.

faqs.q: Does baking vs. frying affect calzone calories?
faqs.a: Baking is lower; frying adds 50-100 kcal from oil absorption.
